featuredShows.mainDesc: Listen weeknights as we tally up the Top 5 requests of the day and play them back starting at 10p.

featuredShows.showDesc:
Subtronic End is 2 hours of the best electronic dance music

10PM to 1AM
featuredShows.mainDesc: Featuring tracks from today’s superstar DJ’s like Tiesto, Avicii, Hardwell, and Calvin Harris, legends of the genre, and the new artists you’ll want to discover. The music sets are mixed in studio by 107.7 The End’s own Zach, who’s been DJing in clubs internationally for years, including residencies in Sevilla Spain, and Cairo Egypt. Subtronic End is a new soundtrack for Saturday night!

'Conversations' is a public affairs program that looks at issues and how they affect individuals, families, our local communities and the nation. Each show explores an issue with newsmakers, pundits, authors, doctors, educators and others who express their views on these topics. Topics covered include the economy, education, the environment, government, terrorism, youth and family, health, discrimination, poverty, aging issues and spirituality.
'Sundays @ 8am, it’s a flashback to the music that started it all!

For over 17 years The End has compiled a massive library of End Sessions, In-Studio Performances and other acoustic gems from your favorite End artists. Seems like pretty good stuff for a radio show… huh? Every Sunday morning from 10am-Noon check out The End Unplugged. Exclusive, stripped down versions of your favorite end songs and artists. From Oasis to Paramore, Social Distortion to The White Stripes and everyone in between. If you miss it/oversleep, don't worry, The End Unplugged will be on demand at 1077theend.com.

featuredShows.showDesc:
Tune in to hear the best from the Pacific Northwest

8PM to 10PM
featuredShows.mainDesc: Sunday nights on Locals Only! It's the weekly local music show on 107.7 the End that airs every Sunday night from 8pm-10pm. It's hosted by Pepper and Steven Graham from the Everett Music Initiative. Want to get your band on Locals Only, Send your music to localsonly@1077theend.com.
Two hours of the newest music from all over the world.
